latest_recipes.description: A savory and satisfying chicken parmesan recipe that's perfect for weeknight dinners. Juicy chicken breasts are breaded and cooked until crispy, then topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese.

This easy-to-make vegetarian lasagna is packed with flavor and sure to please even the most discerning of palates. Layers of fresh pasta, spinach, ricotta cheese, and a rich tomato sauce come together to create a hearty and satisfying meal.
Tender and juicy beef brisket slow-cooked to perfection with a tangy and flavorful BBQ sauce. This recipe is perfect for a summer cookout or a hearty weeknight dinner.
